ground_truth: Ferris shoots him. Ferris runs to the house. Ferris enters the house with his gun held out in front. He turns a corner and sees a man holding a detonator with wires attached. Ferris shoots him and runs out. As the house blows up, Ferris is thrown off his feet. The black choppers fly above a winding river, then a forest. Bassam drags Ferris to the four-by-four. Ferris burns his hand as he grabs CDs and cassettes from the fire. Bassam drags him to the four-by-four, throws him in the back, and drives off. Explosions rip through the buildings. Two four-by-fours drive towards Ferris and Bassam. Ferris cocks a rifle. Ferris shoots at the other vehicles as they approach. They collide on a bend and ram into a rock. Bassam drives off along a dirt road. The two choppers fly over the desert. Ferris keeps shooting at the Iraqis as they follow in the four-by-fours. Bassam radios. The choppers fly overhead. An Iraqi in each of the pursuing four-by-fours loads a rocket-propelled grenade into a launcher. Ferris leans out of the window and shoots at them. The RPG grazes a chopper and the chopper destroys one of the four-by-fours. The other four-by-four gains on Ferris and Bassam. The chopper fires a rocket which destroys the second four-by-four and knocks Ferris and Bassam's four-by-four onto its roof. It slides to a stop in the dirt, throwing Ferris about in the back. One of the choppers lands. A soldier runs to Ferris. Ferris is hauled into the chopper. A soldier knocks Ferris out with an injection and the chopper takes off. Ferris lies by the open hatch. His face splattered with blood. Lying in a hospital, Ferris remembers being with Bassam and his family. The Iraqi prisoner being beaten to death. A doctor leans over Ferris, who wakes. In a yard outside, soldiers are playing basketball. Using tweezers, the doctor picks a sharp fragment from an open wound in Ferris' arm. He puts it with many other fragments in a kidney bowl. U.S. Military Base, Qatar, Persian Gulf. Ferris sits outside. Ferris takes a phone from the agent. Ferris frowns and stares intensely. Ferris hangs up and looks down. There's a bandage around his left forearm. He picks at a small bloody wound and digs out a splinter of bone. He holds up the tiny pointed fragment on his fingertip for a moment. Ferris opens a matchbox and drops the fragment into it. Deep in thought, he rubs his hands together. A grand boulevard with palm trees along strips of grass running between the lanes of traffic. Ferris is in a dirty black BMW with a heavy-set guy wearing shades, Skip.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Ferris fires at him. Ferris sprints to the residence. Ferris penetrates the residence with his firearm extended in front. He pivots a corner and observes a man clutching a detonator with wires linked. Ferris fires at him and dashes out. As the residence explodes, Ferris is hurled off his feet. The ebony helicopters soar above a twisting river, then a forest. Bassam hauls Ferris to the four-by-four. Ferris scorches his hand as he seizes CDs and tapes from the blaze. Bassam hauls him to the four-by-four, tosses him in the rear, and drives away. Blasts tear through the structures. Two four-by-fours move towards Ferris and Bassam. Ferris primes a rifle. Ferris fires at the other automobiles as they near. They crash on a curve and smash into a stone. Bassam drives away along a dirt trail. The two helicopters soar over the wasteland. Ferris continues firing at the Iraqis as they pursue in the four-by-fours. Bassam communicates. The helicopters fly overhead. An Iraqi in each of the chasing four-by-fours loads a rocket-powered grenade into a launcher. Ferris leans out of the opening and fires at them. The RPG grazes a helicopter and the helicopter obliterates one of the four-by-fours. The other four-by-four gains on Ferris and Bassam. The helicopter launches a missile which obliterates the second four-by-four and flips Ferris and Bassam's four-by-four onto its top. It skids to a halt in the soil, hurling Ferris about in the rear. One of the helicopters lands. A trooper runs to Ferris. Ferris is lifted into the helicopter. A trooper knocks Ferris out with an injection and the helicopter departs. Ferris lies by the open hatch. His visage splattered with blood. Lying in a hospital, Ferris recalls being with Bassam and his kin. The Iraqi captive being beaten to demise. A medic leans over Ferris, who awakens. In a yard outside, soldiers are playing basketball. Using forceps, the medic extracts a sharp fragment from an open injury in Ferris' arm. He places it with numerous other fragments in a kidney dish. U.S. Military Base, Qatar, Persian Gulf. Ferris sits outside. Ferris takes a telephone from the operative. Ferris scowls and gazes intensely. Ferris hangs up and looks downward. There's a bandage around his left forearm. He picks at a small bloody injury and extracts a splinter of bone. He holds up the tiny pointed fragment on his fingertip for a moment. Ferris opens a matchbox and drops the fragment into it. Deep in contemplation, he rubs his hands together. A grand avenue with palm trees along strips of grass running between the lanes of traffic. Ferris is in a grimy black BMW with a heavy-set guy wearing shades, Skip.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Ferris is shot by him. The house is run to by Ferris. The house is entered by Ferris with his gun held out in front. A corner is turned by him and a man holding a detonator with wires attached is seen. He is shot by Ferris, and he runs out. As the house blows up, it throws Ferris off his feet. Above a winding river, then a forest, the black choppers fly. Ferris is dragged to the four-by-four by Bassam. Ferris's hand is burned as CDs and cassettes are grabbed from the fire by him. Bassam drags him to the four-by-four, throws him in the back, and drives off. Buildings are ripped through by explosions. Towards Ferris and Bassam, two four-by-fours drive. A rifle is cocked by Ferris. The other vehicles are shot at by Ferris as they approach. On a bend, they collide and are rammed into a rock. Along a dirt road, Bassam drives off. Over the desert, the two choppers fly. At the Iraqis, Ferris keeps shooting as they follow in the four-by-fours. Radios are used by Bassam. Overhead, the choppers fly. Into a launcher, a rocket-propelled grenade is loaded by an Iraqi in each of the pursuing four-by-fours. Out of the window, Ferris leans and shoots at them. A chopper is grazed by the RPG, and one of the four-by-fours is destroyed by the chopper. On Ferris and Bassam, the other four-by-four gains. A rocket is fired by the chopper which destroys the second four-by-four and knocks Ferris and Bassam’s four-by-four onto its roof. In the dirt, it slides to a stop, Ferris being thrown about in the back. One of the choppers is landed. To Ferris, a soldier runs. Into the chopper, Ferris is hauled. With an injection, a soldier knocks Ferris out and the chopper takes off. By the open hatch, Ferris lies. His face is splattered with blood. In a hospital, Ferris lies, remembering being with Bassam and his family. The Iraqi prisoner beats him to death. Over Ferris, a doctor leans, who wakes. In a yard outside, basketball is played by soldiers. Using tweezers, a sharp fragment is picked from an open wound in Ferris' arm by the doctor. It is put with many other fragments in a kidney bowl. U.S. Military Base, Qatar, Persian Gulf. Outside, Ferris sits. A phone is taken from the agent by Ferris. Frowning and staring intensely, Ferris hangs up and looks down. Around his left forearm, there's a bandage. At a small bloody wound, he picks and digs out a splinter of bone. The tiny pointed fragment is held up on his fingertip for a moment by him. A matchbox is opened by Ferris, and the fragment is dropped into it. Deep in thought, his hands are rubbed together. A grand boulevard with palm trees is lined along strips of grass running between the lanes of traffic. In a dirty black BMW with a heavy-set guy wearing shades, Skip, Ferris is seated.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Ferris shoots a man and runs to a house, entering with his gun ready. Turning a corner, he sees another man with a detonator and shoots him too. The house explodes, throwing Ferris off his feet. Black choppers fly over a river and forest. Bassam drags Ferris to a four-by-four, where Ferris burns his hand grabbing CDs and cassettes from the flames. Bassam drives away as explosions hit buildings. Two four-by-fours pursue them, and Ferris shoots at them. They collide with a rock as Bassam continues on a dirt road. Choppers fly overhead as Ferris keeps shooting. Iraqis in the pursuing vehicles aim rocket-propelled grenades. Ferris shoots at them, and a chopper destroys one vehicle. The last four-by-four gains on them, but another chopper destroys it, flipping Ferris and Bassam's car. A soldier retrieves Ferris, who is knocked out with an injection as they're airlifted. Ferris is bloodied and remembers being with Bassam's family and an Iraqi prisoner's death. In a hospital, a doctor removes fragments from Ferris’ arm. At a U.S. Military Base in Qatar, Ferris talks on the phone, hangs up, and examines a wound on his bandaged arm, extracting a bone splinter and dropping it into a matchbox. In a BMW, he is with a heavyset guy named Skip on a palm-lined boulevard.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Ferris shoots a man, enters a house, sees another man with a detonator, shoots him, and escapes. The house explodes, throwing Ferris, as black choppers hover above a river and forest. Bassam drags Ferris to a four-by-four, burns his hand grabbing CDs and cassettes from fire, then drives off. Explosions occur, and two four-by-fours approach. Ferris shoots at them; they crash into a rock. Bassam drives down a dirt road, with choppers overhead. Iraqis load RPGs in pursuit. Ferris shoots back; an RPG grazes a chopper, which destroys a four-by-four. The second four-by-four is destroyed by a chopper's rocket, flipping Ferris and Bassam's vehicle. A chopper lands, and a soldier injects Ferris, knocking him out. Ferris, bloodied, remembers Bassam, his family, and a beaten prisoner, as a doctor treats him in a hospital. At a U.S. military base in Qatar, Ferris picks a splinter from his arm, drops it into a matchbox, and reflects deeply. Finally, Ferris, in a dirty BMW, sits beside Skip, a heavy-set guy in shades, on a palm-lined boulevard.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Ferris swiftly shoots him with precision. With urgency in his movements, Ferris swiftly dashes towards the house. As he approaches and enters the house, he holds his gun extended firmly in front of him. Turning a sharp corner, he is confronted with the sight of a man holding a complex detonator with wires intricately attached. Without hesitation, Ferris shoots him and makes a quick escape, running out of the house. In a dramatic scene, the house explodes, and the force of the blast throws Ferris off his feet. Meanwhile, above a winding river and then a dense forest, black choppers fly menacingly. Bassam hurries to drag Ferris to the waiting four-by-four vehicle. In the midst of chaos, Ferris burns his hand as he frantically grabs CDs and cassettes from the raging fire. Despite his injury, Bassam manages to drag him to the four-by-four, throws him into the back, and quickly drives off. Explosions continue to rip through surrounding buildings with loud intensity. Two more four-by-fours race menacingly towards Ferris and Bassam. In preparation, Ferris cocks a rifle with determination. As the other vehicles approach menacingly, Ferris shoots at them. The vehicles collide on a sharp bend, ramming fiercely into a rock. Skillfully, Bassam drives off onto a dirt road. High above, the two choppers soar over the barren desert. Ferris persistently keeps shooting at the pursuing Iraqis in the four-by-fours. Bassam uses the radio. The choppers continue to fly overhead. An Iraqi in each of the pursuing four-by-fours efficiently loads a rocket-propelled grenade into a launcher. Leaning out precariously from the window, Ferris shoots at them. An RPG grazes a chopper, prompting the chopper to destroy one of the four-by-fours. Yet, the other four-by-four gains ground on Ferris and Bassam. In a decisive move, the chopper fires a rocket, destroying the second four-by-four and causing Ferris and Bassam's four-by-four to flip onto its roof. It skids to a halt in the dirt, violently throwing Ferris around in the back. One of the choppers lands promptly. A soldier rushes to Ferris's aid. Ferris is swiftly hauled into the chopper. With a quick injection, a soldier knocks Ferris out, and the chopper takes off into the sky. Ferris lies near the open hatch, his face splattered with blood, telling a story of survival. Later, lying in a hospital bed, Ferris's mind drifts back to memories of being with Bassam and his family, and witnessing the brutal beating of an Iraqi prisoner. A doctor leans over Ferris, who slowly regains consciousness. Outside in the yard, soldiers energetically play basketball. Using tweezers, the doctor carefully picks a sharp fragment from an open wound in Ferris' arm, placing it with many other fragments collected in a kidney bowl. At a U.S. Military Base in Qatar, located in the Persian Gulf, Ferris sits contemplatively outside. He takes a phone handed to him by an agent. Expressing deep concentration, Ferris frowns and stares intently. After hanging up, he looks down, seeming lost in thought. A bandage is wrapped around his left forearm. Picking at a small, bloody wound, he digs out a splinter of bone. Holding up the tiny, pointed fragment on his fingertip for a brief moment, Ferris then opens a matchbox and drops the fragment inside. Lost deep in thought, he rubs his hands together. A grand boulevard with picturesque palm trees lining strips of grass running between the lanes of traffic catches the eye. Within this scene, Ferris is in a dirty black BMW, accompanied by a heavy-set guy wearing shades, known as Skip.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Ferris, demonstrating remarkable speed and precision, shoots him with unerring accuracy. With a sense of urgency evident in every step he takes, Ferris swiftly makes his way towards the house. As he approaches and then enters the dwelling, he keeps his gun firmly extended in front of him, ready for anything. Upon turning a sharp corner, he is immediately confronted by the sight of a man holding a complex detonator, its wires intricately connected. Without a moment’s hesitation, Ferris shoots the man and makes a quick, hurried escape, running out of the house just in time. In a dramatic and intense scene, the house is engulfed in an explosion, and the sheer force of the blast throws Ferris off his feet. Meanwhile, high above, ominous black choppers fly menacingly over a winding river and then a dense forest. Bassam quickly hurries to drag the dazed Ferris to the waiting four-by-four vehicle. Amidst the surrounding chaos, Ferris burns his hand as he frantically grabs CDs and cassettes from the raging fire. Despite the painful injury, Bassam is able to drag him to the four-by-four, throwing him into the back as he quickly drives off. Explosions continue to rip through the surrounding buildings with loud, deafening intensity. Dangerously approaching, two more four-by-fours race menacingly towards Ferris and Bassam. In preparation for the impending confrontation, Ferris cocks his rifle with determination. As the other vehicles draw closer with a menacing air, Ferris shoots at them. The vehicles, unable to avoid a collision, ram fiercely into a rock on a sharp bend. With skill and precision, Bassam drives off onto a dirt road. High above, the two choppers continue to soar over the barren desert landscape. Ferris persistently keeps shooting at the pursuing Iraqis in the four-by-fours. Meanwhile, Bassam utilizes the radio efficiently. The choppers continue to fly overhead, maintaining their presence. An Iraqi, in each of the pursuing four-by-fours, efficiently loads a rocket-propelled grenade into a launcher. Leaning out from the window precariously, Ferris shoots at them. An RPG grazes a chopper, prompting it to destroy one of the four-by-fours in retaliation. Despite this setback, the remaining four-by-four gains ground on Ferris and Bassam. In a decisive move, the chopper fires a rocket, obliterating the second four-by-four and causing Ferris and Bassam's vehicle to flip abruptly onto its roof. It skids violently to a halt in the dirt, throwing Ferris around with force in the back. One of the choppers lands promptly, and a soldier rushes to Ferris's aid. Ferris is swiftly hauled into the chopper, and with a quick injection, a soldier administers something that knocks Ferris out cold, allowing the chopper to take off into the sky swiftly. Lying near the open hatch, Ferris's face is splattered with blood, telling a silent story of survival. Later, as he lies in a hospital bed, Ferris's mind drifts back to moments of being with Bassam and his family, and the haunting scene of an Iraqi prisoner being brutally beaten. A doctor leans over Ferris, who is slowly regaining consciousness. Outside in the yard, soldiers energetically engage in a game of basketball. Using tweezers, the doctor carefully picks a sharp fragment from an open wound in Ferris’s arm, placing it delicately among many other fragments collected in a kidney bowl. At a U.S. Military Base in Qatar, situated in the Persian Gulf, Ferris sits contemplatively outside. He takes a phone, handed to him by an agent. Expressing deep concentration, Ferris frowns and stares intently at the device. After hanging up, he looks down, appearing lost in thought. A bandage is wrapped around his left forearm, covering a small, bloody wound from which he carefully digs out a splinter of bone. Holding up the tiny, pointed fragment on his fingertip for a moment, Ferris then opens a matchbox and drops the fragment inside. Lost deep in thought, he rubs his hands together absently. In the background, a grand boulevard with picturesque palm trees lining strips of grass running between the lanes of traffic catches the eye. Within this bustling scene, Ferris is seated in a dirty black BMW, accompanied by a heavy-set man wearing shades, known as Skip.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: The scene unfolds as Ferris, with a determined expression and steady aim, raises his gun and shoots a man standing before him. With urgency, he sprints toward the house, his feet pounding against the ground. As Ferris reaches the house, he pushes the door open, his gun leading the way, poised for action. Inside, he swiftly turns a corner, where his eyes land on a man clutching a detonator, its wires snaking out unnervingly. Without hesitation, Ferris fires his gun again, ensuring the threat is neutralized before he bolts back outside. No sooner has he exited than the house erupts in an explosive spectacle, the force of the blast knocking Ferris off his feet. Meanwhile, overhead, black choppers soar across the landscape, casting shadows over a winding river and a dense forest. In a swift act of rescue, Bassam arrives, grabbing hold of Ferris and dragging him toward their four-by-four. Amidst the chaos, Ferris reaches into the flames, snatching CDs and cassettes, searing his hand in the process. Ignoring the pain, Bassam hauls him into the four-by-four's backseat and accelerates away from the scene as buildings behind them are torn apart by further explosions. As they speed away, two more four-by-fours appear in pursuit, barreling toward them. With a calm precision, Ferris readies a rifle, aiming and shooting at the approaching vehicles. The chase reaches its crescendo as their adversaries collide while navigating a bend and crash forcefully into a rock. Bassam, seizing the opportunity, veers off down a dirt road, seeking refuge. Above them, the choppers continue their vigilant flight over the harsh desert terrain. Ferris, undeterred, persistently fires at the Iraqis giving chase in their four-by-fours. Amid the chaos, Bassam communicates via radio, orchestrating their escape, as the choppers maintain a watchful presence overhead. Tensions rise as an Iraqi in each pursuing vehicle loads a rocket-propelled grenade into a launcher, prompting Ferris to lean precariously out the window and fire at them. Despite his efforts, one RPG narrowly misses a chopper, which retaliates by annihilating one of the four-by-fours. The remaining vehicle closes in on Ferris and Bassam, only to be obliterated as the chopper discharges a rocket that flips Ferris and Bassam's four-by-four onto its roof, sending it skidding to a dusty halt and tossing Ferris around violently inside. One of the choppers, descending gracefully, lands, and a soldier rushes to Ferris, swiftly hauling him into the chopper's interior. An injection is administered, and Ferris succumbs to unconsciousness as the chopper ascends into the sky. As he lies near the open hatch, blood splattering his face, memories flood back—of Bassam, family moments, and the haunting scene of an Iraqi prisoner being brutally beaten. His eyes flutter open to the sight of a doctor leaning over him in a hospital. Through a window, soldiers can be seen playing basketball in the yard outside. With the utmost care, the doctor uses tweezers to extract a sharp fragment from a wound in Ferris' arm, adding it to a collection of other fragments in a kidney bowl. Later, at the U.S. Military Base in Qatar near the Persian Gulf, Ferris sits outside, contemplative. He receives a phone from an agent, and as he listens, his brow furrows, and his gaze intensifies with thought. Hanging up, he looks down to see a bandage wrapped around his left forearm. Curious, he picks at a small bloody wound, deftly digging out a splinter of bone. For a moment, he examines the tiny, pointed fragment perched on his fingertip. He retrieves a matchbox and carefully deposits the fragment inside. Lost in reflection, he rubs his hands together, his mind elsewhere as the scene transitions to a grand boulevard lined with palm trees and strips of grass dividing lanes of traffic. In a dirty black BMW parked nearby sits Ferris, accompanied by Skip, a heavy-set man wearing shades, together poised for whatever might come next.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Ferris shoots the man and rushes into the house with his gun raised. Spotting another man with a detonator, he fires again before quickly escaping. The house explodes, and Ferris is thrown off his feet. Nearby, black choppers soar over the river and forest. Bassam pulls Ferris to the four-by-four, where Ferris burns his hand retrieving CDs and cassettes from the fire. Bassam hurls him into the vehicle and speeds away. Explosions rock the buildings as two other four-by-fours pursue them. Ferris loads his rifle and fires at the approaching vehicles, causing them to crash into a rock. Bassam escapes down a dirt road while two choppers fly across the desert. As Ferris shoots at their pursuers, Bassam radios for help. An Iraqi in each of the chasing vehicles readies an RPG, and Ferris leans out to shoot at them. One RPG grazes a chopper, which then destroys one of the four-by-fours. The other closes in, but a chopper-fired rocket obliterates it, flipping Ferris and Bassam's vehicle onto its roof. It skids to a halt, tossing Ferris around inside. A chopper lands, and a soldier runs to Ferris, injecting him to render him unconscious before they take off. In the chopper, Ferris lies bleeding by the hatch. In a hospital, Ferris recalls moments with Bassam and his family, and a prisoner’s brutal death. A doctor removes sharp fragments from Ferris' arm, adding them to a bowl. At a U.S. Military Base in Qatar, Ferris sits outside, receives a phone from an agent, and reacts with deep concentration before hanging up. He examines a bandage on his forearm, extracts a bone splinter, and drops it into a matchbox while lost in thought. In a grimy black BMW on a palm-lined boulevard, Ferris is accompanied by a heavy-set man named Skip.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Ferris, a seasoned operative in a tense mission, shoots him. Ferris runs to the house situated in a war-torn area known for frequent insurgent activities. Ferris enters the house with his gun held out in front. He turns a corner and sees a man, an enemy combatant, holding a detonator with wires attached that likely connect to an explosive device. Ferris shoots him and runs out. As the house blows up, producing a deafening blast, Ferris is thrown off his feet by the shockwave. The black choppers, military helicopters used for both transport and attack, fly above a winding river, then a dense forest that offers limited visibility. Bassam, a trusted ally in the operation, drags Ferris to the four-by-four vehicle, essential for navigating the rough terrain. Ferris burns his hand as he urgently grabs CDs and cassettes, which likely contain crucial intelligence information, from the fire. Bassam drags him to the four-by-four, throws him in the back, and drives off as explosions rip through the nearby buildings, illustrating the chaotic conflict zone. Two four-by-fours drive towards Ferris and Bassam, clearly in pursuit. Ferris cocks a rifle, ready for the impending confrontation. Ferris shoots at the other vehicles as they approach, showcasing his combat experience. They collide on a bend, a treacherous curve that often challenges drivers in the area, and ram into a rock. Bassam drives off along a dirt road, a common escape route in regions with minimal infrastructure. The two choppers fly over the desert, assisting in aerial surveillance. Ferris keeps shooting at the Iraqis, enemy forces pursuing them, as they follow in the four-by-fours. Bassam radios for support, utilizing military communication for coordination. The choppers fly overhead, prepared to engage. An Iraqi in each of the pursuing four-by-fours loads a rocket-propelled grenade, a weapon capable of significant destruction, into a launcher. Ferris leans out of the window and shoots at them, attempting to prevent an attack. The RPG grazes one of the choppers, causing minimal damage, and the chopper retaliates, destroying one of the four-by-fours. The other four-by-four gains on Ferris and Bassam, a persistent threat. The chopper fires a rocket which destroys the second four-by-four and knocks Ferris and Bassam's four-by-four onto its roof. It slides to a stop in the dirt, throwing Ferris about in the back due to the violent motion. One of the choppers lands, a tactical decision for extraction. A soldier runs to Ferris, prioritizing his safety. Ferris is hauled into the chopper, an expeditious evacuation. A soldier knocks Ferris out with an injection, a standard procedure in high-risk scenarios, and the chopper takes off. Ferris lies by the open hatch, his face splattered with blood, a testament to the ordeal. Lying in a hospital, a military medical facility designed for trauma care, Ferris remembers being with Bassam and his family, memories mingled with pain. The Iraqi prisoner being beaten to death, a haunting event he witnessed. A doctor leans over Ferris, who wakes to the sterile environment. In a yard outside, soldiers are playing basketball, a common pastime for those stationed away from home. Using tweezers, the doctor picks a sharp fragment from an open wound in Ferris' arm. He puts it with many other fragments in a kidney bowl, a surgical receptacle. U.S. Military Base, Qatar, Persian Gulf, a strategic location for operations in the region. Ferris sits outside, contemplating his next move. Ferris takes a phone from the agent, a point of contact with headquarters. Ferris frowns and stares intensely, processing critical information. Ferris hangs up and looks down, the weight of the mission evident. There's a bandage around his left forearm, indicating recent medical attention. He picks at a small bloody wound and digs out a splinter of bone, remnants of the conflict. He holds up the tiny pointed fragment on his fingertip for a moment, reflecting on the experience. Ferris opens a matchbox and drops the fragment into it, an improvised keepsake. Deep in thought, he rubs his hands together, considering the implications. A grand boulevard with palm trees along strips of grass running between the lanes of traffic, emblematic of Middle Eastern urban landscapes. Ferris is in a dirty black BMW with a heavy-set guy wearing shades, Skip, a fellow operative known for his unflappable demeanor.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: Ferris shoots him. Ferris runs to the house. Ferris enters the house with his gun held out in front. He turns a corner and sees a man holding a detonator with wires attached. Ferris shoots him and runs out. As the house blows up Ferris is thrown off his feet. The black choppers fly above a winding river then a forest. Bassam drags Ferris to the fourbyfour. Ferris burns his hand as he grabs CDs and cassettes from the fire. Bassam drags him to the fourbyfour throws him in the back and drives off. Explosions rip through the buildings. Two fourbyfours drive towards Ferris and Bassam. Ferris cocks a rifle. Ferris shoots at the other vehicles as they approach. They collide on a bend and ram into a rock. Bassam drives off along a dirt road. The two choppers fly over the desert. Ferris keeps shooting at the Iraqis as they follow in the fourbyfours. Bassam radios. The choppers fly overhead. An Iraqi in each of the pursuing fourbyfours loads a rocketpropelled grenade into a launcher. Ferris leans out of the window and shoots at them. The RPG grazes a chopper and the chopper destroys one of the fourbyfours. The other fourbyfour gains on Ferris and Bassam. The chopper fires a rocket which destroys the second fourbyfour and knocks Ferris and Bassam's fourbyfour onto its roof. It slides to a stop in the dirt throwing Ferris about in the back. One of the choppers lands. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. A soldier runs to Ferris. Ferris is hauled into the chopper. A soldier knocks Ferris out with an injection and the chopper takes off. Ferris lies by the open hatch. His face splattered with blood. Lying in a hospital Ferris remembers being with Bassam and his family. The Iraqi prisoner being beaten to death. A doctor leans over Ferris who wakes. In a yard. outside soldiers are playing basketball. Using tweezers the doctor picks a sharp fragment from an open wound in Ferris' arm. He puts it with many other fragments in a kidney bowl. US Military Base. Qatar Persian Gulf. Ferris sits outside. Ferris takes a phone from the agent. Ferris frowns and stares intensely. Ferris hangs up and looks down. There is a bandage around his left forearm. He picks at a small bloody wound and digs out a splinter of bone. He holds up the tiny pointed fragment on his fingertip. for a moment. Ferris opens a matchbox and drops the fragment into it. Deep in thought he rubs his hands together. A grand boulevard with palm trees along strips of grass running between the lanes of traffic. Ferris is in a dirty black BMW with a heavyset guy wearing shades. Skip.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: Ferris shoots him. Ferris runs to the house. Ferris enters the house with his gun held out in front. He turns a corner and sees a man holding a detonator with wires attached. Ferris shoots him and runs out. As the house blows up Ferris is thrown off his feet. The black choppers fly above a winding river then a forest. Bassam drags Ferris to the fourbyfour. Ferris burns his hand as he grabs CDs and cassettes from the fire. Bassam drags him to the fourbyfour throws him in the back and drives off. Explosions rip through the buildings. Two fourbyfours drive towards Ferris and Bassam. Ferris cocks a rifle. Ferris shoots at the other vehicles as they approach. They collide on a bend and ram into a rock. Bassam drives off along a dirt road. The two choppers fly over the desert. Ferris keeps shooting at the Iraqis as they follow in the fourbyfours. Bassam radios. The choppers fly overhead. An Iraqi in each of the pursuing fourbyfours loads a rocketpropelled grenade into a launcher. Ferris leans out of the window and shoots at them. The RPG grazes a chopper and the chopper destroys one of the fourbyfours. The other fourbyfour gains on Ferris and Bassam. The chopper fires a rocket which destroys the second fourbyfour and knocks Ferris and Bassam's fourbyfour onto its roof. It slides to a stop in the dirt throwing Ferris about in the back. One of the choppers lands. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Carla flings the basketball. Carla skips to the barn. Carla wanders into the barn with her frisbee floating overhead. She bends around a pine and notices a leopard clutching a slingshot with strings attached. Carla flings the basketball and skips away. As the barn implodes, Carla is whisked off her toes. The green balloons bob below a winding highway, then a valley. Quentin pulls Carla to the skateboard. Carla scalds her elbow as she plucks postcards and letters from the flame. Quentin tugs her to the skateboard, flings her on the front, and skates away. Thunderstorms carve through the bridges. Two skateboards roll toward Carla and Quentin. Carla swings a hammer. Carla flings nails at the opposite mascots as they chase. They swivel on a curve and slam into a fence. Quentin skates away along a gravel track. The two balloons bounce over the ocean. Carla keeps flinging nails at the Aussies as they tag along on skateboards. Quentin whistles. The balloons drift nearby. An Aussie in each trailing skateboard loads a javelin into a slingshot. Carla leans over the railing and flings nails at them. The javelin brushes a balloon and the balloon demolishes one of the skateboards. The other skateboard closes in on Carla and Quentin. The balloon launches a firework which smashes the second skateboard and flips Carla and Quentin's skateboard onto its head. It shuffles to a pause in the grass, tossing Carla around in the front. One of the balloons settles. A chauffeur saunters to Carla. Carla is lugged into the balloon. A chauffeur bonks Carla out with a whistle and the balloon floats away. Carla lies by the open hatch. Her face dappled with paint. Reclining in a park, Carla remembers dancing with Quentin and his friends. The Aussie captive being laughed to sleep. A nurse hovers over Carla, who yawns. In a garden outside, chauffeurs are juggling frisbees. Using a toothbrush, the nurse flicks a shiny pebble from a sealed envelope on Carla's elbow. He places it with countless other pebbles in a cereal bowl. U.K. Embassy, Iceland, Arctic Ocean. Carla lounges inside. Carla snatches a tablet from the mystic. Carla broods and squints briefly. Carla disconnects and gazes up. There's a sticker on her right shoulder. She pecks at a tiny purple bruise and extracts a bit of metal. She waves the miniature shiny pebble on her knuckle for a while. Carla flips a suitcase and tucks the metal into it. Lost in thought, she clasps her ears together. A narrow alley with oak trees along patches of moss resting beside the paths of joggers. Carla is in a squeaky orange pickup with a slender lady donning scarves, River.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: In a tense action sequence, Ferris shoots a man with a detonator, escapes a house explosion, and is dragged to safety by Bassam. They flee in a four-by-four while Ferris fends off attackers, shooting at pursuing vehicles. Helicopters join the chase, with one RPG grazing a chopper, which then destroys the attackers. Ferris and Bassam's vehicle flips, and Ferris is rescued and sedated by soldiers in a chopper. In a hospital, Ferris remembers past events with Bassam and an Iraqi prisoner. As he recovers, a doctor removes fragments from his arm. At a U.S. military base in Qatar, Ferris reflects, picks out a bone splinter, and stores it in a matchbox, deep in thought. He later sits in a dirty BMW with Skip, a heavy-set man.
